ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(EBH_FinanceAgreesinPrincipal__c) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Voided") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Draft") || ISPICKVAL(Status , "Sent for Finance Pre-check") ) && ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_ACP" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_ListingAgreement") && NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The contract type you have selected requires Finance pre-check prior to negotiation.
